data.text: Tuun, Ratha lamtiang kutchoi ngai jarra, ule naingai,
Nangni'n Pathian ningjetmaklai, karingmak ramil ngaidiang chubei thonasik-ah lamleiitiang katamlang naleikeiruoi.

Khawa jarra kei'n nangni kanaminjetzoot khachu, Pathian Ratha in inruoipui tuteii miring kha'n “Jisu diang khomaak saamnuni!” khat-um Ratha Inthiang in inruoipui miring khan elekleiya “Jisu hi Pumi eii” tinuni.
Kutchoi katamtak om, takkha Ratha chu inkhatbit eii;
halli phamtang chu atam, takkha Pumi chu inkhatbit eii;
chuonlam chu atam, takkha Pathian inkhatbit khan inchuon inchuonlam kha mi rakipdiang apeii.
Mi rakip thanasik Ratha khan mirakip diang inlar.
Ratha khan miring inkhat diang lungsing lungwar chongkha apeii, khawa Ratha takkhan aleiilaak miring inkhatdiang jetna theina kha apeii.
Inkhatbit ka eii khat-um in-angrip Ratha khan miring inkhatdiang ngamna apeii, khat-um aleiilaak miring inkhatdiang mindam matorna kutchoi apeii.

Ratha khan miring inkhatdiang chuon inlak thomatorna, aleiilaak miringdiang akahongsik rilmatorna, aleiilaak miringdiang ratha ngai thenmatorna, aleiilaak miringdiang inliak chong rilmatorna, halli aleiilaak midiang inliak chongngai maletmatorna apeii.
Hiwa ngai rakip hi inkhatbit khat-um in-angrip Ratha khan itho kha eii; mi rakip diang ama'n ipezoot alak alak kutchoi kha apeii. Rom 12:6-8
Pum chu inkhatbit eii takkha saram katamtak in-om, halli saram katamtak khan pum inkhatbit inbool angnga, Christa diang-um eii. Rom 12:4,5

Ajarchu Jihudi erase Greek erase, emakli suok khat-um suok ka-emak erase, Ratha inkhatbit khan eini rakip pum inkhatbit enasik-ah baptize anamintho; halli eini rakip Ratha inkhatbit diangnga inphut namin-injei.
Pum kha saram khatbit emak takkha saram katamtak eii.
Keii khan “Keichu kut ki-emak keengnga keichu pum emong” ti-inchu, khawa khan ama kha pum e-emakjei emak.
Halli kuor khan “Keichu mit ki-emak keengnga, keichu pum emong” ti-inchu, khawa khan ama kha pum emongjei titheinuni.
Taksa pumpui mitbit e-inle, hunme nira-ngainasik? Taksa pumpui kuorbit e-inle, hunme arim nimanim nasik?
Takkha pumma kaom saram rakip kha in-omnasik munna ama lungdou nuoiya abool.
Saram ngai rakip in-angrip inle, pum khaleii hun omsikme?
Takkha tuunchu, saram intam innum pum khachu inkhatbit eii.
Khawa jarra, mit khan kut diang, “Nangchu keisik-ah iteii narei ommak titheinuni,” khat-um lu khan keii diang “Nangchu keisik-ah iteii narei ommak titheinuni.”
Eini'n saram ngai karra kasuol ngaikha inchel lekleiya iteii thothei numin,
halli saram ngai karra eini'n nirawat nongmak ngaikha eii eini'n katha doomma nibool; khat-um saram ngai karra enzoot kaommak ngaikha eii eini'n kalurra khoya nitho,
akathajei saram ngaikha khoya thosik ommak, takkha Pathian in saram ngai rakip aminchun halli insam saram ngaikha kheeldoomma khoya thonasik apeii,
ajarchu, pumkha inkhoithen ommaknasik, takkha saram rakip ngai'n khat-in inkhat sik-ah in-angrip ngaidon nasik eii.
Saram inkhat in apoongpha khan saram rakip in poongna innei; saram inkhat khoya inthopha khan, saram rakip ngai'n inroksuom.
Tuunchu nangni Christa taksapum kha ning eii, halli nangni rakip, khawa taksapumma kaom saram ngaikha ning eii.

Halli koisuok suungnga Pathian in mansakhet-ah tirton ngaikha insangkhet-ah akadang, inni huuina-ah Pathian chongkachoi ngai, inthum huuina-ah ocha ngai, halli inlak chuonkatho ngai, halli kana kamindam mator ngai, mi kasan ngai, chuon karoon ngai, khat-um inliak chongkaril ngai. Eph 4:11
Mi rakip tirton in-ebe? Mi rakip Pathian chongkachoi in-ebe? Mi rakip ocha in-ebe? Mi rakip inlak chuon inthobe?
Mi rakip kana mindam matorna kutchoi inneibe? Mi rakip inliak chong inrilbe? Mi rakip in chong inmaletbe?
Takkha akathadoom kutchoi ngaikha nangni'n manuomru.
